Text: and yes its legit, i converted it small so if you were a website owner its in a streamable source and a quick download. I already know theres gonna be some idiot showing expect this to be DVD quality on his 52 inch tv. Its a cam, and resolution has been changed for handhelds and websites.
Its the TS release just converted to Mp4, nothing has been done to change it except make it fit on a handheld screen.
